item.title: orientation
item.description: Rotate the image 90 degrees at a time. By default this module sets the orientation based on the image’s Exif data. module controls rotate Double click the label to reset the image’s rotation counter-clockwise Rotate the image 90 degrees counter-clockwise clockwise Rotate the image 90 degrees clockwise
